required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Vestibular Socket Therapy in Immediate Implants With Grafting Materials
clinical_study.official_title: A Comparative Study Evaluating Vestibular Socket Therapy in Immediate Implants Using Different Grafting Materials

brief_summary.textblock: The current research aims at evaluating the outcomes of the vestibular socket therapy in immediate implants using collagen plug, demineralized freeze-dried bone allograft, and deproteinized bovine bone minerals at both radiographic and clinical levels

primary_outcome.description: Each group will be subjected to: Cone beam computed tomography (CBCT) at baseline, 6 months, and 12months to assess the thickness of the labial (facial) plate of bone and implant survival
Each group will be subjected to: Cone beam computed tomography (CBCT) at baseline, 6 months, and 12months to assess height of labial (facial) plate of bone and implant survival

secondary_outcome.description: Each group will be subjected to Intraoral scanning at baseline, 6 months and 12 months. The changes in peri-implant mucosal level will be assessed by superimposition of scanning files of different intervals to monitor the changes in surface area calculated by software.

arm_group.arm_group_label: VST with collagen plug soaked in blood
VST with Allograft Demineralized bone matrix Grafton
VST with autogenous cortical chips and bovine deprotinzed particles

intervention.intervention_name: VST with collagen plug soaked in blood
intervention.description: -A sub mucoperiosteal tunnel will be created, a membrane shield will be trimmed to fit the facial wall of the socket and introduced through the tunnel lying over the facial bone plate, and the facial gap will be filled with collagen plug soaked in blood
intervention.arm_group_label: VST with collagen plug soaked in blood

intervention.intervention_name: VST with Allograft Demineralized bone matrix Grafton
intervention.description: -A sub mucoperiosteal tunnel will be created, a membrane shield will be trimmed to fit the facial wall of the socket and introduced through the tunnel lying over the facial bone plate, and the facial gap will be filled with Allograft Demineralized bone matrix Grafton
intervention.arm_group_label: VST with Allograft Demineralized bone matrix Grafton

intervention.intervention_name: VST with a particulate bone graft composed of two thirds autogenous cortical chips harvested from the surgical site and one third of bovine deprotinzed particles
intervention.description: -A sub mucoperiosteal tunnel will be created, a membrane shield will be trimmed to fit the facial wall of the socket and introduced through the tunnel lying over the facial bone plate, and the facial gap will be filled with a particulate bone graft composed of two thirds autogenous cortical chips harvested from the surgical site and one third of bovine deprotinzed particles
intervention.arm_group_label: VST with autogenous cortical chips and bovine deprotinzed particles

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients will be included if they have one or more hopeless teeth without signs of acute infection in the maxillary anterior region.
- Remaining roots or non-restorable teeth with sufficient bone apically and palatably to allow proper implant positioning with sufficient primary stability.
- Optimal compliance as evidenced by no missed treatment appointments and a positive attitude towards oral hygiene.
- Medically free
Exclusion Criteria:
- Medically compromised patients and systemic conditions precluding implant and periodontal surgery.
- Smokers, diabetics, pregnant or lactating women.
- History of chemotherapy, radiotherapy in head and/or neck region.
- Bisphosphonate therapy
